Files Headings

data-streaming.js

 
"use strict";

var sphero = require("../");
var orb = sphero(process.env.PORT);

orb.connect(function() {

options for streaming data

 
  var opts = {
    n: 200,
    m: 1,
    mask1: 0x00000000,
    pcnt: 0,
    mask2: 0x0D800000
  };

  orb.setDataStreaming(opts);

  orb.on("dataStreaming", function(data) {
    console.log("streaming data packet recieved");
    console.log("  data:", data);
  });

  orb.roll(150, 0);
});
